Travel Policy Change

Training on Use of I-Travel


January 16 - February 27
Wednesdays
9:00 am-10:00 am
Kimbal 292 - Conference Room


A recently approved policy change will require BYU-Idaho employees to use the Travel Office online booking tool called "I Travel" when arranging single destination, domestic travel for air, hotel and car.

Regular training opportunities will be provided for all employees every Tuesday and Thursday for at least the next couple months. On-line training will be available soon. It is our priority that everyone is comfortable and confident using this new tool.

 

To register for one of the trainings please send an e-mail to traveloffice@byui.edu and let us know what day you will attend. We will check for available space in the session and reply as quickly as possible.

If you are not able to attend one of these weekly meetings, you can contact us at traveloffice@byui.edu or call (208) 496-2343 to arrange for a 1 on 1 meeting. One of us can come by your office and show you the tool, as well as answer any other questions you might have.

It will be helpful to have the following, when you come to the training:

-Driver's license
-Credit Card  (This is the corporate travel card or the card you want charged when traveling)
-Department travel account number
  (All of the above  information will be required to set up a profile to use I Travel)
